website_summaries.verdict: This pedestal-style transmission jack is intended for use in combination with in-ground and above-ground lifts.
pros: For use with in-ground and above-ground lifts
Wheels swivel a full 360 degrees on ball bearing casters
cons: Look for something taller if you are much over 5-foot 8-inches tall

customer_reviews.title: WEAK!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was overly impressed when i looked at the reviews of this item. Now, seeing it in person with only 350lbs on top of it, I wouldn't trust this jack with a 850lb transmission on it to save my life. The wheels are small and weak, the entire jack could barely hold a differential on top of it. this was a huge safety concern and the first use after assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Jeramy sands

customer_reviews.title: Works like expected, nice feature is the threaded levelers for all directions
customer_reviews.text: First ones jack didn't work, but replacement arrived and worked great, used it under a 4 post lift to remove a transfercase and it was a very nice way of saving the body. in the past I have muscled things into place and had another person place mounting bolts. I am older now and I don't have the recovery and with this I also don't have to wait for help.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Holzhey

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work right out of the box!
customer_reviews.text: I put it all together, did the air bleeding routine like the instructions say, never would pump up. Called the 800 number they supplied, I was on hold for 25 minutes, then got a recording to leave my name and phone number and someone would call me back. They never did. At the end of the day, I requested a replacement jack, we will see if the second one works. My advice is to try out the cylinder before you put anything together, that’s what I’m doing on the next one. Amazon did make it very easy to return. UPDATE: 2nd jack works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: tactransman

customer_reviews.title: READ BEFORE BUYING!
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was made complicated due to poor fit and finish. Bolt holes not lining up etc. Seemed to operate fine until under load(well under 1000lb limit) then complete failure. Seals seem blown to me. Email sent to Torin but no response, poor quality product, zero customer service. Do not buy this product or anything sold by this brand.
customer_reviews.author: WILL

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Decent Jack, does what it says. It is however too short, I modified it to make it taller and it is mind numbingly slow going up. Since it will be used sparingly in my home shop it isn't really a problem, but I wouldn't buy it if it were something you planned to use often in a commercial shop.
customer_reviews.author: Demon Dameon

customer_reviews.title: Good value,  No instructions.
customer_reviews.text: Jack did not come with instructions for assembly, pretty basic but didn’t figure out that the three long bolts were for the legs until it was halfway together lol. Used it the day I got it, gf put it together while buddy and I pulled trans, seems like a good value for price. I am definitely happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Richard B.

customer_reviews.title: Good for normal size transmission.
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my worn out 20 year old shop use big red with another and it’s good. The feet are shorter than previous version but it seemed steady for front wheel drive transmission (saab 9.5) I pulled. I got this one even though the 2 stage jacks are only a little more money,I need to have front and rear and side to side tilt for the cars I service and the common 2 stage jacks don’t have that.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet motors

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product, but if you are 6'6" with a ...
customer_reviews.text: i have an extra tall lift and I am a very tall person. This is a great product, but if you are 6'6" with a tall lift, you might want to buy the extra tall version of it. A normal person 5'8 or less can use this without hitting their heads, but us big guys need the extra high one. Quality good and I 've used it several times to pull and replace transmissions on old junk dodges (because there are 2 types of Dodges, ones with Transmission problems, and ones who are about to have transmission problems.)
customer_reviews.author: LaRoseFamily

customer_reviews.title: Broke within 2 months, very dangerous don't buy
customer_reviews.text: My mechanic was using this to lift up a transmission which is the sole purpose of this product and why we bought it surprise surprise and then BAM! it cam crashing down and the transmission fell over onto the floor "LUCKILY!" not injuring my mechanics. The product is now broken and we plan on buying another one from somewhere else. Buy at your own risk
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PICK ME UP
customer_reviews.text: If your removing a transmission with a hydraulic car lift this is necessary. You dont want to be strong arming a transmission in and out of position. Save yourself the strain and let Torin do the work. With this hydraulic lift, lifting any rear end, transmission and anything will be effortless and done with ease. I cant recommend this product enough. 10/10. Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsey Lindt

customer_reviews.title: Don't let the package discourage you
customer_reviews.text: Ups didn't ship very well, box was beat to heck and ripped so I was a little dubious about opening. After opening parts were a bit scratched and one leg slightly bent but not too bad and easy fix. Worked very well and was extremely easy to put together
customer_reviews.author: Raymond H. Shelhart

customer_reviews.title: Not bad. Can be improved
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this product to help me move a steel beam from one location to another. The product seems ok but is may not hold up in the long run. Honestly, it is cheaply made but good cheap buy overall.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and pretty stout.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great taking the transmission out of the 86 F-150 my son in law is restoring. Felt solid and I had no worries about it failing or falling over. Assembly was straight forward.
customer_reviews.author: SEOMike

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Was damaged in shipping. But very poor quality. I would not recommend this
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: Not that great.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this item did not last 30 days. The ram seals blew out while the transmission was on it. Very frustrating. It would not pump up at all. Had to return the item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sorry I bought it
customer_reviews.text: Cheap price and cheap quality, what else did I expect. Some nuts and bolts were missing and no real assembly instructions except for a blow up diagram that I could barely read even with glasses. The bothersome issue is that there was a nut welded to the side of the collar under the top platform that has a bolt in it that is supposed to hold the platform securely to the top of the jack. The nut was poorly spot welded to the collar and it fell off as I tried to snug it up to the jack head. I should have paid a little more for a better unit.
customer_reviews.author: David H. Stenmark

customer_reviews.title: Worked look good I’m happy for the price
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok, works did the job but it’s sos slow to get to hight. So far everything’s good transmission has been removed and installed. Buy a jack support stand too you will need it to support the end of v8 transmissions.
customer_reviews.author: LH

customer_reviews.title: Would buy it again - no buyers remorse here.
customer_reviews.text: More heavy duty than expected. Removed my T10 transmission from my 65 Mercury Comet - absolutely no problem. Nice having the jack supporting all of the weight - made the job much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Terry F. Barlow

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This jack worked perfectly under the rear cradle of a 2014 Corvette. Great fit, and good angle controls. I used it in combination with a basic screw jack to pull the entire rear cradle w/ torque tube still attached.
customer_reviews.author: WDP22

customer_reviews.title: Great and works well.
customer_reviews.text: Good product. I used this to take a Nv3500 trans out of a s10. Not bad the head of it swivels on a ball and socket sort of deal so seems scary but it worked couldn't do the job without it. The hydraulic part of it takes a while but again unless your going to spend the money on a big fancy one this will do the job
customer_reviews.author: shaun s

customer_reviews.title: Box damaged but in good condition.
customer_reviews.text: Box came in damaged and in bad shape. All the parts where there. Husband is very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary M.

customer_reviews.title: Good value trans jack.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good light use unit. Used to put a 4L60E in a GM product, and both removal and install went smoothly. Not a commercial grade unit by any means, but adjustability and stability is just fine for occasional use.
customer_reviews.author: Cletus Runswithscissorsguy

customer_reviews.title: great jack for my car
customer_reviews.text: bought on amazon as hf did not have the unit.easy to assemble. works well for my ford c6 transmission.
customer_reviews.author: John Maricich

customer_reviews.title: Not a high lift
customer_reviews.text: Works well, not very easy to assemble by yourself and is not a high lift. If you are shorter than 6 foot this is fine, any taller you will need to make it 4-6 inches taller. It is sturdy and does actually function very well.
customer_reviews.author: Racing_Mommy

customer_reviews.title: For the money its great. The top pedestal has a lot of adjustment
customer_reviews.text: For the money its great. The top pedestal has a lot of adjustment. The casters roll pretty good. The jack takes forever to jack up but what can you ask for the price. I remove the chain strap and added a tie-down strap to secure trans to jack. Works so much better..
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M.

customer_reviews.title: It arrived in poor packaging with missing hardware
customer_reviews.text: It's a cheap import jack. It arrived in poor packaging with missing hardware. Fit and finish was absolutely terrible. Skip this one and buy a 2 stage, you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Works especially well when the vehicle is on a lift.
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a transmission in a 2006 Dodge dakota. Made the job much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Jon In Tucson

customer_reviews.title: You get what you paid
customer_reviews.text: One of the screw welding broke off during assembly. This is not for a mechanic that will constantly be replacing transmission, this is more for a weekend mechanic
customer_reviews.author: Noryem G. Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: Not for the professional
customer_reviews.text: Not for a professional. Jack's up very little per stroke. Sits too high to work a fuel tank when fully down. Pressure release not easy to use when the jack is loaded.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Moreno

customer_reviews.title: It’s crap DONT BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: Pure crap, do not buy this. Legs bent as soon as I put a transmission on it, the whole thing leaned like crazy to one side my buddy who was helping me swore it was going to fall over. DO NOT BUY THIS THING ITS GARBAGE, hell harbor freight has better ones
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Speed more money less headache
customer_reviews.text: Sucks to use try’s to roll away or fall over
customer_reviews.author: Ande Smith

customer_reviews.title: Buy a different jack
customer_reviews.text: Trans jack is weak. Takes forever to jack up. With every jack pump, it only moves 1/2inch. Slow.
customer_reviews.author: Liane S.

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy enough!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Pulled one 4l60e trans out of a suburban, lowered it all the way down and went to move it a few feet to take trans off and it fell over on me and busted the case of the transmission, good thing I jumped outta the way it could have been bad!
customer_reviews.author: Keller Investment Group

customer_reviews.title: Missing and leaking!
customer_reviews.text: When I received this product the jack was leaking. I am missing all of the hardware to put it together and also did not receive the chains and hooks.
customer_reviews.author: Tori Falls

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: At this time we can not to get it to work! Any suggestions? After many different ideas it still does not work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I got what I paid for. Its not quality ...
customer_reviews.text: I got what I paid for. Its not quality and it's not junk. I've used it once and it got the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Galen W

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived in a damaged box. Did not realize it was bent before attempting to use resulting in complete product failure. The legs are also too narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Amy J. Rice

customer_reviews.title: Breaking news
customer_reviews.text: Works great used it on a 1995 Chevy 1500 4x4 transmission
customer_reviews.author: Ken Stem

customer_reviews.title: It's ok for the money
customer_reviews.text: Ok it's well made but it only moves up very little while jacking
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and is pretty high when all the way down making it almost ...
customer_reviews.text: Will do the job but pumps up very slow, and is pretty high when all the way down making it almost impossible to put tranny on or off by your self , I would prefer a 2 stage cylinder to make lower and easier to use
customer_reviews.author: Bubba J

customer_reviews.title: Junk junk junk will kill someone if you’re not careful
customer_reviews.text: Do not do not do not use this especially in a real shop environment. Absolutely junk. Will seriously hurt or kill someone if you aren’t careful. Get a quality name brand one instead
customer_reviews.author: Amir

customer_reviews.title: but the cost of this jack makes it the best selection for me
customer_reviews.text: With cost being a very big factor, quality of materials and construction as the next considerations, and how functional it is all plays a part in evaluating the jack. There are plenty of jacks that exceed this jack, but the cost of this jack makes it the best selection for me. If I had a transmission shop vs hobby shop I would consider a more expensive jack.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I've just used this jack today to hold up a muffler while I attached it to the muffler hangers. It worked very well and didn't seem to take long for the jack to raise to the proper height. I had no problems getting the jack to lower either and it seems to do what it was designed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Mtn.Mike

customer_reviews.title: Good jack.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Saved a lot of grunting and moaning. I used it on a standard shift trans in a power stroke diesel and it did the job great. Wasn't wobbly at all. Left it on the stand over night while I ordered parts. Been nice to have a quick foot pedal but all in all worked just fine,
customer_reviews.author: Knifer

customer_reviews.title: Solid jack. Has slow valving in pump.
customer_reviews.text: Solid jack. Has slow valving in pump. Gets the job done just takes some time
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Despite that it works great with my maxjax
customer_reviews.text: Pardone my french but its slow as piss. Despite that it works great with my maxjax. Black piece shortened by cutting.
customer_reviews.author: Ap

customer_reviews.title: If it has any damage to packaging, refuse it!
customer_reviews.text: It came with out any hardware at all, followed instructions to get missing parts, nothing this fare almost 90 days later. Have made seven attempts to get parts, nothing yet!
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Pickett

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Not strong or sturdy I’ll be reinforcing it. Jack takes forever to go up.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Probably quality is fair. Their was welding slag in some of the holes. And we are missing the jack handle. Will update after use ! But took one star away from quality and missing parts.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Proffitt

customer_reviews.title: Good Cheap Tool
customer_reviews.text: Did the job no problems! Worked great to remove my 1969 Camaro automatic and install a 4-speed. Good adjustment range and felt secure. Good deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Keith J Williams

customer_reviews.title: Customer service sucks product is junk
customer_reviews.text: Never worked out of the box now the customer service is hard to get ahold of after leaving 4 messages they never called back finally get ahold of them they will not do a full replacement only parts JUNK dont waist your time or money
customer_reviews.author: Steven lanzon

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Pulled two transmissions with it already. Easy to use and assemble
customer_reviews.author: Nate Scheibner

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine. But that packaging
customer_reviews.text: Did what should. Worked fine. But that packaging... Like everyone else box was crap and was missing bolts. Not a huge deal but Amazon should look at the packaging a little bit on this one.
customer_reviews.author: lisa nicol

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Nice solid feel, everything works well. Good jack for the money. I gave 4 stars because it was not boxed well for shipping. Box looked like been dropped a few times, corner was open & bag of hardware opened & was everywhere inside box. A couple nuts/bolts were missing.
customer_reviews.author: MDV

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Better than I expected for the money! Excellent and easy to put together!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Hackworth

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: The only problem I have with the jack is the amount of lift you get with each pump of the handle. It takes a lot of pumps to get it where you want it to go.
customer_reviews.author: Harold W. Melius

customer_reviews.title: It gets the job done for a cheap price. ...
customer_reviews.text: It gets the job done for a cheap price. The base is a little tall, about three inches to tall. Other than that its ok.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great jack, a bit tipsy, but guess what do you expect for something this tall
customer_reviews.author: kccobra

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts can't put together
customer_reviews.text: Box came damaged with hole in it needless to say missing parts not able to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Feels like a durable product, but I broke it 5 minutes after opening box
customer_reviews.text: I really don't like to write negative reviews, but I broke this jack 5 minutes after opening the box (during assembly). The welds on the main set nut had zero penetration into the metal. During assembly the nut wouldn't tightened and eventually broke off. I did not send the product back as the rest of the jack seems to be well made. Instead I decided to weld it back on and fix it myself. See the pictures for a better explanation.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Marcoccio

customer_reviews.title: Handy tool to have in your shop
customer_reviews.text: Price was right, and came fast. We will see how it stands up to service.
customer_reviews.author: craig bigler

customer_reviews.title: Worked okay.
customer_reviews.text: Worked okay. leaked some fluid and the box was damaged when i got it so i was shorted a few bolts
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Moore

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP QUALITY, MISSING FASTENERS, LEGS WERE BENT AND DOES NOT SIT STRAIGHT!
customer_reviews.text: CHEAP QUALITY, MISSING FASTENERS, LEGS WERE BENT AND DOES NOT SIT STRAIGHT!
customer_reviews.author: SCOTT MCKINNEY

customer_reviews.title: The jack will not retract. I put 600 lbs ...
customer_reviews.text: The jack will not retract. I put 600 lbs on it, nothing moved. Placed a call to tech support. No return phone call. Very poor customer service, I have now called three times with no return phone call, would not recommend purchasing this product.
customer_reviews.author: Roger H.

customer_reviews.title: Does what it should
customer_reviews.text: This is a good item.It does what it should do.I used it on my modified Wrangler.I didnt use the instructions to put it together.It was an easy assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Bigdog

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice but when I put a transmission on there the weight bent the bottom
customer_reviews.author: samoel nikzat

customer_reviews.title: Did the job, no problem!
customer_reviews.text: Did a nice job working on clutch replacement on a Ford Ranger. It's excellent for the price, and met my expectations. Also, a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Dash

customer_reviews.title: not a good product
customer_reviews.text: when we recieved it the hydraulic tube was cracked and leaking! and now i cannot return the item.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan McCreary

customer_reviews.title: bot ti fine for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Its verry slow up, bot ti fine for the Price !!
customer_reviews.author: edgardo

customer_reviews.title: Will not lift after 2 uses
customer_reviews.text: No where to check fluid level in Ram - Used twice
customer_reviews.author: Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: The tilt adjustment was broken when received. Had to weld it to use it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great.
customer_reviews.text: A little shakey on a large transmission, other than that for the price, great.
customer_reviews.author: Racer Rick

customer_reviews.title: Issue
customer_reviews.text: Have used it for a year and item no longer pumps up
customer_reviews.author: Joanna mcnamara

customer_reviews.title: But like Torin products it works and is up to specs
customer_reviews.text: Its what youd expect for the price. Nothing special. But like Torin products it works and is up to specs. Moves pretty slowly. But hey... If you need a trans jack and only have $140.. This will certainly get you by. Im a happy dude.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Laird

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: THE LIFT WAS INCOMPLETE, MISSING PARTS AND CAN'T EVEN USE IT
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Its first transmission jacks go this is about the worst I've ever seen in my 40 year career
customer_reviews.text: This thing doesn't even come close to doing a job don't waste your money don't buy it It doesn't come close to extending high enough the brackets are very weak to change system for sale
customer_reviews.author: fred bostick

customer_reviews.title: NOT STURDY
customer_reviews.text: WE PUT ONE TRANS ON THERE THAT WAS GROSSLY UNDER WEIGHT AND THE WHOLE STAND BENT TO THE SIDE!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tavarras Davis

customer_reviews.title: I dont recommend it for anyone that plans on doing more than ...
customer_reviews.text: The transmission jack hydrolic ram just gave on its 4th transmission job......, base is also small and makes the unit very top heavy. I dont recommend it for anyone that plans on doing more than 1 transmission job.
customer_reviews.author: Chani D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: JACK IT
customer_reviews.text: GREAT PRICE ,A LITTLE SHAKY ON THE TOP MAKE SURE YOU USE THE CHAIN. PUMPS UP SLOW BUT DID THE JOB
customer_reviews.author: ms

customer_reviews.title: ... it a little taller but other then that it's great
customer_reviews.text: The jack has been working well so far it's on its 15 tranny in the short few months I'v had it I added a there inch spacer to make it a little taller but other then that it's great
customer_reviews.author: Dusty

customer_reviews.title: ... I would spend the extra money and buy a better
customer_reviews.text: if I was changing transmissions for a living I would spend the extra money and buy a better jack
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL BERNS

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after about a month of use. On ...
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after about a month of use. On the plus side, it was a hassle free return other than the extra time to disassemble.
customer_reviews.author: Luke B Walker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised, Handled a Ford 4R75E transmission with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: TexRex

customer_reviews.title: Works like a champ
customer_reviews.text: Not as tall as I would like, but works excellent, very happy
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Very slow ascending and descending jack literally takes 10- 15 ...
customer_reviews.text: Very slow ascending and descending jack literally takes 10- 15 min. Both ways came to my house beat to s*** the box was shredded the quality of the jack is so so and it was a pain to put together
customer_reviews.author: richard hanna

customer_reviews.title: It looks nice but when I put a transmission on there the ...
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice but when I put a transmission on there the weight bent the bottom part slightly where the wheels in the frame meets I am unhappy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: purvie

customer_reviews.title: A little slow on the up side but for the money, excellent! Came with four angle hold brackets for top, but only three holes dril
customer_reviews.text: A little slow on the up side but for the money, excellent! Came with four angle hold brackets for top, but only three holes drilled. Otherwise worked great!
customer_reviews.author: George M. Stenhouse

customer_reviews.title: Was easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to assemble. Did the job as advertised. Can't beat it for the price. Great for the backyard mechanic.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Prevost Jr.

customer_reviews.title: best transmission jack for the money
customer_reviews.text: If you want a less expensive transmission jack then this is it. With a home garage I couldnt want anything more for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kalman

customer_reviews.title: Great jack
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use with my car lift. It is well made and easy to put together. The top is big enough to hold most transmissions and also doubles as a stand for oil, transmission, or radiator drain pans.
customer_reviews.author: Chorefamily

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Works well just a little slow meaning it takes a lot of pumps to raise up. Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Matty181

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great basic jack pumps up slow but great for the money
customer_reviews.author: Melissa M.

customer_reviews.title: time saver
customer_reviews.text: jack worked as stated, saved me many frustrations on the install....removal was without it laying on my back using a floor jack
customer_reviews.author: Gregory M. Adkisson

customer_reviews.title: Very good value and worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly to drop the trans from my 911. Good quality welds, hydraulics and wheels. Provided very stable and secure support for the trans.
customer_reviews.author: Graham Hager Motors

product_meta.title: BIG RED TR4053 Torin Hydraulic Garage/Shop Telescoping Transmission Floor Jack: 1/2 Ton (1,000 lb) Capacity, Red
product_meta.description: This 1/2 ton capacity pedestal transmission jack has all the quality features you want. Durable steel, dipped enamel finish, and 49.6 inches to 68.7 inches high lift range. Rolls smoothly under hoisted vehicle, making it easy to remove or install any transmission from car or light truck, manual or automatic. Designed to use with in-ground and above-ground lifts. Release valve for control of lowering. Adjustable saddle with corner brackets and safety chains. Hardware and instructions included. Saddle adjusts to fit any transmission, safety chain tilts forward, backward and side-to-side, 1 piece jack handle, stable 39-1/2 inches x 39-1/2 inches 4-leg base, and 3 inches steel wheels swivel full 360 degrees on ball bearing casters.
feature_bullets: 1/2 ton capacity pedestal transmission jack with 49.6 inches to 68.7 inches high lift range
Durable steel and dipped enamel finish
Designed to use with in-ground and above-ground lifts and easy to remove or install any transmission from car or light truck, manual or automatic
Saddle adjusts to fit any transmission and safety chain tilts forward, backward and side-to-side
4-leg base with 3 inches steel wheels that swivel full 360 degrees on ball bearing casters

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars185 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
